MatchingRuleItem.name: MatchingRuleItem
MatchingRuleItem.description: Represents criteria used by a matching rule to identify duplicate records.

BlankValueBehavior.description: Specifies how blank fields affect whether the fields being compared are considered matches. Valid values are: MatchBlanks NullNotAllowed (default)

Field.description: Indicates which field to compare when determining if a record is similar enough to an existing record to be considered a match.

MatchingMethod.description: Defines how the fields are compared. Choose between the exact matching method and various fuzzy matching methods. Valid values are: Exact FirstName LastName CompanyName Phone City Street Zip Title For details on each matching method, see “Matching Methods Used with Matching Rules” in the Salesforce Help.

MatchingRuleId.description: The ID for the matching rule.

SortOrder.description: The order of the matching rule items for a matching rule.
